    • Method Detail

      • getAccount

        @RequestMapping(method=GET,
                value="/energy/accounts/{accountId}",
                produces="application/json")
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasAuthority(\'SCOPE_energy:accounts.detail:read\')")
org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<EnergyAccountDetailResponse> getAccount(@PathVariable(value="accountId")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               String accountId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               @RequestHeader(value="x-v",required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               Integer xV,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               @RequestHeader(value="x-min-v",required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               Integer xMinV,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               @RequestHeader(value="x-fapi-interaction-id",required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               UUID xFapiInteractionId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               @RequestHeader(value="x-fapi-auth-date",required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               String xFapiAuthDate,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               @RequestHeader(value="x-fapi-customer-ip-address",required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               String xFapiCustomerIpAddress,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               @RequestHeader(value="x-cds-client-headers",required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               String xCdsClientHeaders)
        GET /energy/accounts/{accountId} : Get Energy Account Detail Obtain detailed information for a specific energy account
        Parameters:
        accountId - ID of a specific account to obtain data for. This is a tokenised ID previous obtained from the Account List end point. (required)
        xV - Version of the API end point requested by the client. Must be set to a positive integer. The data holder should respond with the highest supported version between [x-min-v](#request-headers) and [x-v](#request-headers). If the value of [x-min-v](#request-headers) is equal to or higher than the value of [x-v](#request-headers) then the [x-min-v](#request-headers) header should be treated as absent. If all versions requested are not supported then the data holder must respond with a 406 Not Acceptable. See [HTTP Headers](#request-headers) (required)
        xMinV - Minimum version of the API end point requested by the client. Must be set to a positive integer if provided. The data holder should respond with the highest supported version between [x-min-v](#request-headers) and [x-v](#request-headers). If all versions requested are not supported then the data holder must respond with a 406 Not Acceptable. (optional)
        xFapiInteractionId - An [RFC4122](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc4122) UUID used as a correlation id. If provided, the data holder must play back this value in the x-fapi-interaction-id response header. If not provided a [RFC4122] UUID value is required to be provided in the response header to track the interaction. (optional)
        xFapiAuthDate - The time when the customer last logged in to the data recipient. Required for all resource calls (customer present and unattended). Not to be included for unauthenticated calls. (optional)
        xFapiCustomerIpAddress - The customer's original IP address if the customer is currently logged in to the data recipient. The presence of this header indicates that the API is being called in a customer present context. Not to be included for unauthenticated calls. (optional)
        xCdsClientHeaders - The customer's original standard http headers [Base64](#common-field-types) encoded, including the original User Agent header, if the customer is currently logged in to the data recipient. Mandatory for customer present calls. Not required for unattended or unauthenticated calls. (optional)
        Returns:
        Successful response (status code 200) or The following error codes MUST be supported:
        • [400 - Invalid Field](#error-400-field-invalid)
        • [400 - Invalid Version](#error-400-header-invalid-version)
        • [406 - Unsupported Version](#error-406-header-unsupported-version)
        • [404 - Unavailable Energy Account](#error-404-unavailable-energy-account)
        • [404 - Invalid Energy Account](#error-404-invalid-energy-account)
        (status code 4xx)

Mandatory for customer present calls. Not required for unattended or unauthenticated calls. (optional)

      • getBillingForAccount

        @RequestMapping(method=GET,
                value="/energy/accounts/{accountId}/billing",
                produces="application/json")
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasAuthority(\'SCOPE_energy:billing:read\')")
org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<EnergyBillingListResponse> getBillingForAccount(@PathVariable(value="accountId")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       String accountId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       @RequestHeader(value="x-v",required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       Integer xV,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       @RequestHeader(value="x-min-v",required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       Integer xMinV,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       @Valid @RequestParam(value="newest-time",required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       @Valid String newestTime,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       @Valid @RequestParam(value="oldest-time",required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       @Valid String oldestTime,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       @Valid @RequestParam(value="page",required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       @Valid Integer page,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       @Valid @RequestParam(value="page-size",required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       @Valid Integer pageSize,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       @RequestHeader(value="x-fapi-interaction-id",required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       UUID xFapiInteractionId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       @RequestHeader(value="x-fapi-auth-date",required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       String xFapiAuthDate,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       @RequestHeader(value="x-fapi-customer-ip-address",required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       String xFapiCustomerIpAddress,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       @RequestHeader(value="x-cds-client-headers",required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       String xCdsClientHeaders)
        GET /energy/accounts/{accountId}/billing : Get Billing For Account Obtain the billing transactions for a specific account
        Parameters:
        accountId - ID of a specific account to obtain data for. This is a tokenised ID previous obtained from the Account List end point. (required)
        xV - Version of the API end point requested by the client. Must be set to a positive integer. The data holder should respond with the highest supported version between [x-min-v](#request-headers) and [x-v](#request-headers). If the value of [x-min-v](#request-headers) is equal to or higher than the value of [x-v](#request-headers) then the [x-min-v](#request-headers) header should be treated as absent. If all versions requested are not supported then the data holder must respond with a 406 Not Acceptable. See [HTTP Headers](#request-headers) (required)
        newestTime - Constrain the request to records with effective time at or before this date/time. If absent defaults to current date/time. Format is aligned to DateTimeString common type (optional)
        oldestTime - Constrain the request to records with effective time at or after this date/time. If absent defaults to newest-time minus 12 months. Format is aligned to DateTimeString common type (optional)
        page - Page of results to request (standard pagination) (optional)
        pageSize - Page size to request. Default is 25 (standard pagination) (optional)
        xMinV - Minimum version of the API end point requested by the client. Must be set to a positive integer if provided. The data holder should respond with the highest supported version between [x-min-v](#request-headers) and [x-v](#request-headers). If all versions requested are not supported then the data holder must respond with a 406 Not Acceptable. (optional)
        xFapiInteractionId - An [RFC4122](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc4122) UUID used as a correlation id. If provided, the data holder must play back this value in the x-fapi-interaction-id response header. If not provided a [RFC4122] UUID value is required to be provided in the response header to track the interaction. (optional)
        xFapiAuthDate - The time when the customer last logged in to the data recipient. Required for all resource calls (customer present and unattended). Not to be included for unauthenticated calls. (optional)
        xFapiCustomerIpAddress - The customer's original IP address if the customer is currently logged in to the data recipient. The presence of this header indicates that the API is being called in a customer present context. Not to be included for unauthenticated calls. (optional)
        xCdsClientHeaders - The customer's original standard http headers [Base64](#common-field-types) encoded, including the original User Agent header, if the customer is currently logged in to the data recipient. Mandatory for customer present calls. Not required for unattended or unauthenticated calls. (optional)
        Returns:
        Successful response (status code 200) or The following error codes MUST be supported:
        • [400 - Invalid Field](#error-400-field-invalid)
        • [400 - Invalid Page Size](#error-400-field-invalid-page-size)
        • [400 - Invalid Version](#error-400-header-invalid-version)
        • [406 - Unsupported Version](#error-406-header-unsupported-version)
        • [422 - Invalid Page](#error-422-field-invalid-page)
        • [404 - Unavailable Energy Account](#error-404-unavailable-energy-account)
        • [404 - Invalid Energy Account](#error-404-invalid-energy-account)
        (status code 4xx)

      • getDERForServicePoint

        @RequestMapping(method=GET,
                value="/energy/electricity/servicepoints/{servicePointId}/der",
                produces="application/json")
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasAuthority(\'SCOPE_energy:electricity.der:read\')")
org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<EnergyDerDetailResponse> getDERForServicePoint(@PathVariable(value="servicePointId")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                String servicePointId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                @RequestHeader(value="x-v",required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Integer xV,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                @RequestHeader(value="x-min-v",required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Integer xMinV,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                @RequestHeader(value="x-fapi-interaction-id",required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                UUID xFapiInteractionId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                @RequestHeader(value="x-fapi-auth-date",required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                String xFapiAuthDate,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                @RequestHeader(value="x-fapi-customer-ip-address",required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                String xFapiCustomerIpAddress,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                @RequestHeader(value="x-cds-client-headers",required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                String xCdsClientHeaders)
        GET /energy/electricity/servicepoints/{servicePointId}/der : Get DER For Service Point Obtain a list of DER data from a particular service point
        Parameters:
        servicePointId - ID of the specific service point requested. This is a tokenised ID previous obtained from the Service Point List Data end point. Note that it is not a nationalMeteringId. (required)
        xV - Version of the API end point requested by the client. Must be set to a positive integer. The data holder should respond with the highest supported version between [x-min-v](#request-headers) and [x-v](#request-headers). If the value of [x-min-v](#request-headers) is equal to or higher than the value of [x-v](#request-headers) then the [x-min-v](#request-headers) header should be treated as absent. If all versions requested are not supported then the data holder must respond with a 406 Not Acceptable. See [HTTP Headers](#request-headers) (required)
        xMinV - Minimum version of the API end point requested by the client. Must be set to a positive integer if provided. The data holder should respond with the highest supported version between [x-min-v](#request-headers) and [x-v](#request-headers). If all versions requested are not supported then the data holder must respond with a 406 Not Acceptable. (optional)
        xFapiInteractionId - An [RFC4122](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc4122) UUID used as a correlation id. If provided, the data holder must play back this value in the x-fapi-interaction-id response header. If not provided a [RFC4122] UUID value is required to be provided in the response header to track the interaction. (optional)
        xFapiAuthDate - The time when the customer last logged in to the data recipient. Required for all resource calls (customer present and unattended). Not to be included for unauthenticated calls. (optional)
        xFapiCustomerIpAddress - The customer's original IP address if the customer is currently logged in to the data recipient. The presence of this header indicates that the API is being called in a customer present context. Not to be included for unauthenticated calls. (optional)
        xCdsClientHeaders - The customer's original standard http headers [Base64](#common-field-types) encoded, including the original User Agent header, if the customer is currently logged in to the data recipient. Mandatory for customer present calls. Not required for unattended or unauthenticated calls. (optional)
        Returns:
        Successful response (status code 200) or The following error codes MUST be supported:
        • [400 - Invalid Field](#error-400-field-invalid)
        • [400 - Invalid Version](#error-400-header-invalid-version)
        • [406 - Unsupported Version](#error-406-header-unsupported-version)

        xFapiCustomerIpAddress - The customer's original IP address if the customer is currently logged in to the data recipient. The presence of this header indicates that the API is being called in a customer present context. Not to be included for unauthenticated calls. (optional)
        xCdsClientHeaders - The customer's original standard http headers [Base64](#common-field-types) encoded, including the original User Agent header, if the customer is currently logged in to the data recipient. Mandatory for customer present calls. Not required for unattended or unauthenticated calls. (optional)
        Returns:
        Successful response (status code 200) or The following error codes MUST be supported:
        • [400 - Invalid Field](#error-400-field-invalid)
        • [400 - Invalid Page Size](#error-400-field-invalid-page-size)
        • [400 - Invalid Version](#error-400-header-invalid-version)
        • [406 - Unsupported Version](#error-406-header-unsupported-version)
        • [422 - Invalid Page](#error-422-field-invalid-page)
        (status code 4xx)

If not provided a [RFC4122] UUID value is required to be provided in the response header to track the interaction. (optional)
        xFapiAuthDate - The time when the customer last logged in to the data recipient. Required for all resource calls (customer present and unattended). Not to be included for unauthenticated calls. (optional)
        xFapiCustomerIpAddress - The customer's original IP address if the customer is currently logged in to the data recipient. The presence of this header indicates that the API is being called in a customer present context. Not to be included for unauthenticated calls. (optional)
        xCdsClientHeaders - The customer's original standard http headers [Base64](#common-field-types) encoded, including the original User Agent header, if the customer is currently logged in to the data recipient. Mandatory for customer present calls. Not required for unattended or unauthenticated calls. (optional)
        Returns:
        Successful response (status code 200) or The following error codes MUST be supported:
        • [400 - Invalid Field](#error-400-field-invalid)
        • [400 - Invalid Page Size](#error-400-field-invalid-page-size)
        • [400 - Invalid Version](#error-400-header-invalid-version)
        • [406 - Unsupported Version](#error-406-header-unsupported-version)
        • [422 - Invalid Page](#error-422-field-invalid-page)
        • [422 - Unavailable Service Point](#error-422-unavailable-service-point)
        • [422 - Invalid Service Point](#error-422-invalid-service-point)
        (status code 4xx)

        @RequestMapping(method=GET,
                value="/energy/plans",
                produces="application/json")
org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<EnergyPlanListResponse> listPlans(@RequestHeader(value="x-v",required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                                             Integer xV,
                                                                                                                                                                                             @RequestHeader(value="x-min-v",required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                                             Integer xMinV,
                                                                                                                                                                                             @Valid @RequestParam(value="type",required=false,defaultValue="ALL")
                                                                                                                                                                                             @Valid ParamTypeEnum type,
                                                                                                                                                                                             @Valid @RequestParam(value="fuelType",required=false,defaultValue="ALL")
                                                                                                                                                                                             @Valid ParamFuelTypeEnum fuelType,
                                                                                                                                                                                             @Valid @RequestParam(value="effective",required=false,defaultValue="CURRENT")
                                                                                                                                                                                             @Valid ParamEffective effective,
                                                                                                                                                                                             @Valid @RequestParam(value="updated-since",required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                                             @Valid java.time.OffsetDateTime updatedSince,
                                                                                                                                                                                             @Valid @RequestParam(value="brand",required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                                             @Valid String brand,
                                                                                                                                                                                             @Valid @RequestParam(value="page",required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                                             @Valid Integer page,
                                                                                                                                                                                             @Valid @RequestParam(value="page-size",required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                                             @Valid Integer pageSize)
        GET /energy/plans : Get Generic Plans Obtain a list of energy plans that are currently offered to the market. Note that the results returned by this end point are expected to be ordered in descending order according to `lastUpdated`.
        Parameters:
        xV - Version of the API end point requested by the client. Must be set to a positive integer. The data holder should respond with the highest supported version between [x-min-v](#request-headers) and [x-v](#request-headers). If the value of [x-min-v](#request-headers) is equal to or higher than the value of [x-v](#request-headers) then the [x-min-v](#request-headers) header should be treated as absent. If all versions requested are not supported then the data holder must respond with a 406 Not Acceptable. See [HTTP Headers](#request-headers) (required)
        type - Used to filter results on the type field. Any one of the valid values for this field can be supplied plus 'ALL'. If absent defaults to 'ALL' (optional, default to ALL)
        fuelType - Used to filter results on the fuelType field. Any one of the valid values for this field can be supplied plus 'ALL'. If absent defaults to 'ALL' (optional, default to ALL)
        effective - Allows for the filtering of plans based on whether the current time is within the period of time defined as effective by the effectiveFrom and effectiveTo fields. Valid values are ‘CURRENT’, ‘FUTURE’ and ‘ALL’. If absent defaults to 'CURRENT' (optional, default to CURRENT)
        updatedSince - Only include plans that have been updated after the specified date and time. If absent defaults to include all plans (optional)
        brand - Used to filter results on the brand field. If absent defaults to include all plans (optional)
        page - Page of results to request (standard pagination) (optional)
        pageSize - Page size to request. Default is 25 (standard pagination) (optional)
        xMinV - Minimum version of the API end point requested by the client. Must be set to a positive integer if provided. The data holder should respond with the highest supported version between [x-min-v](#request-headers) and [x-v](#request-headers). If all versions requested are not supported then the data holder must respond with a 406 Not Acceptable. (optional)
        Returns:
        Successful response (status code 200) or The following error codes MUST be supported:
        • [400 - Invalid Field](#error-400-field-invalid)
        • [400 - Invalid Page Size](#error-400-field-invalid-page-size)
        • [400 - Invalid Version](#error-400-header-invalid-version)
        • [406 - Unsupported Version](#error-406-header-unsupported-version)
        • [422 - Invalid Page](#error-422-field-invalid-page)
        (status code 4xx)

If the value of [x-min-v](#request-headers) is equal to or higher than the value of [x-v](#request-headers) then the [x-min-v](#request-headers) header should be treated as absent. If all versions requested are not supported then the data holder must respond with a 406 Not Acceptable. See [HTTP Headers](#request-headers) (required)
        servicePointIdList - Request payload containing list of specific Service Points to obtain data for (required)
        oldestDate - Constrain the request to records with effective date at or after this date. If absent defaults to newest-date minus 24 months days. Format is aligned to DateString common type (optional)
        newestDate - Constrain the request to records with effective date at or before this date. If absent defaults to current date. Format is aligned to DateString common type (optional)
        page - Page of results to request (standard pagination) (optional)
        pageSize - Page size to request. Default is 25 (standard pagination) (optional)
        xMinV - Minimum version of the API end point requested by the client. Must be set to a positive integer if provided. The data holder should respond with the highest supported version between [x-min-v](#request-headers) and [x-v](#request-headers). If all versions requested are not supported then the data holder must respond with a 406 Not Acceptable. (optional)
        xFapiInteractionId - An [RFC4122](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc4122) UUID used as a correlation id. If provided, the data holder must play back this value in the x-fapi-interaction-id response header. If not provided a [RFC4122] UUID value is required to be provided in the response header to track the interaction. (optional)
        xFapiAuthDate - The time when the customer last logged in to the data recipient. Required for all resource calls (customer present and unattended). Not to be included for unauthenticated calls. (optional)
        xFapiCustomerIpAddress - The customer's original IP address if the customer is currently logged in to the data recipient. The presence of this header indicates that the API is being called in a customer present context. Not to be included for unauthenticated calls. (optional)
        xCdsClientHeaders - The customer's original standard http headers [Base64](#common-field-types) encoded, including the original User Agent header, if the customer is currently logged in to the data recipient. Mandatory for customer present calls. Not required for unattended or unauthenticated calls. (optional)
        Returns:
        Successful response (status code 200) or The following error codes MUST be supported:
        • [400 - Invalid Field](#error-400-field-invalid)
        • [400 - Invalid Page Size](#error-400-field-invalid-page-size)
        • [400 - Invalid Version](#error-400-header-invalid-version)
        • [406 - Unsupported Version](#error-406-header-unsupported-version)
        • [422 - Invalid Page](#error-422-field-invalid-page)
        • [422 - Unavailable Service Point](#error-422-unavailable-service-point)
        • [422 - Invalid Service Point](#error-422-invalid-service-point)
        (status code 4xx)
